channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pennsylvania Supreme Court Retention Election Is a Key Swing-State Test
item.description: In a major judicial election in the Keystone State, Democrats are more focused than Republicans.

item.title: President Trump, Don’t Fall into Putin’s Arms Control Trap
item.description: New START should not be extended.

item.title: Appeals court delivers blow to Trump's attempt to send National Guard to Portland
item.description: A federal appeals court on Tuesday erased a ruling that would have allowed President Trump to deploy National Guard troops to Portland, Oregon, saying...

item.title: Kathryn Bigelow Plays War in A House of Dynamite
item.description: Why this no-nukes bugaboo is anti-patriotic dreck.

item.title: PEN America’s Inflated Book-Ban List
item.description: It’s only logical for schools to make choices about age-appropriate reading. And how ‘banned’ is a book if you can get it from Amazon in 24 hours?

item.title: Senate Republicans abandon 'piecemeal' plan to ease shutdown pain
item.description: Senate Republicans have decided against trying to pass piecemeal bills to mitigate some of the harm from the government shutdown.

item.title: Trump says 'it's too bad' he can't run for a third presidential term
item.description: President Donald Trump said Wednesday that "it's too bad" he's not allowed to run for a third term, conceding the constitutional reality even as he ex...

item.title: Senate votes to nullify Trump's tariffs on Brazil in symbolic messaging effort
item.description: The Senate voted late Tuesday to terminate the emergency powers that President Trump used to impose tariffs on goods from Brazil, a major coffee produ...

item.title: Standing Athwart Open Borders
item.description: Help support the antidote to utopian neglect.

item.title: Oversight Committee Urges DOJ To Probe And ‘Void’ Pardons Signed By Biden’s Autopen
item.description: The committee notes Biden was, “losing command of himself,” and his executive actions, especially the pardons, cannot be deemed his own.

item.title: Nicolle Wallace Is Blatantly Lying About Democrats’ Assassination Prep
item.description: Wallace's claim that no Democrat has ever suggested Trump is Hitler is demonstrably false.

item.title: Democrats Don’t Get To Play The Patriotism Card While Embracing Anti-Americanism
item.description: The anti-Americanism within the Democrat Party leaves no room for its members to play the patriotism card in opposition to Trump.

item.title: RNC Election Integrity Machine Revs Up In Virginia And New Jersey
item.description: The RNC’s election integrity team, sources on the ground tell The Federalist, continues to build on its 2024 election protection campaign.

item.title: Report: Hospitals Use Electronic Medical Records To Coax Children Into Gender ‘Transition’
item.description: Electronic medical records ask the same questions used by predatory activist doctors to point children toward irreversible medical interventions like ...

item.title: Ballooning food stamp program held hostage by Congress' government shutdown standoff
